definition: located in or toward the back or rear, the side that goes last or is not normally seen, construct, build, or erect
details:
adjective
- located in or toward the back or rear
= synonyms: rearward
noun
- the side that goes last or is not normally seen
= synonyms: back
- the fleshy part of the human body that you sit on
= synonyms: tail
- the back of a military formation or procession
= example: the back of a military formation or procession
- the part of something that is furthest from the normal viewer
= synonyms: back
- the side of an object that is opposite its front
= example: the side of an object that is opposite its front
= synonyms: backside, back end
verb
- construct, build, or erect
= synonyms: raise
- stand up on the hind legs, of quadrupeds
= example: stand up on the hind legs, of quadrupeds
= synonyms: rise up
- cause to rise up
= synonyms: erect
- bring up
= synonyms: parent
- rise up
= synonyms: lift
